Sorry for the late reply. @mohitshah3111999 and me recently came up with a naming convention for IDs (both in xml and in java). You can find it here: https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/wiki/Code-style#resource-id-naming You can find the discussion in #4399
According to that convention, it should be noMediaLabel.
